title: Ticket #4139: Non-blocking collector
description:
The collector has the potential to block when receiving updates due to the size of the daemon ad. We should provide a non-blocking version of getClassAd (similar to the work done for putClassAdNonblocking) and make this non-blocking.

Branch posted:

https://github.com/bbockelm/htcondor/tree/non_blocking_collector_updates
remarks:
2014-Aug-08 07:51:05 by bbockelm:
Abandoning ticket because making DaemonCommandProtocol non-blocking and not invoke callbacks until a full CEDAR message is available returned made all these changes unnecessary.

The collector is now non-blocking.
